title: WTF Is Happening To Women?
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I enjoyed this video and concur with you, see you next time on Patreon.
Thank you MGM, you are so insightful and right! Blessed Be Soul Sister x
Thank you for posting and using your platform.  I have found solidarity in my women friends AMEN #support
Very well said Mary. Happy International Women’s Day!!! 😊

You are so true! I really really miss Obama, though I'm Canadian. Since the second grade I used to hang with the boys all the way up to the present. I noticed in the early 2000. I have attempted to make girl friends. But it always goes wrong. I would have their backs, been supportive, was very caring without overgoing it. This is up to three years ago. I've had a "friend" who stabbed me in the back, or ignore, or competed with me, or telling lies...now this take a me back to second grade when my so called friend did to me all the the things these other girl friends have done to me. Except for this same girl from grade 2 was very manipulative. I don't trust girls. The last three years I have up on female friends and accepted that I'd rather hang out with guys. Guys don't bitch with other guys like girls do. Now I hold girls at arm's length but I'm no longer bitter about girl friends. I'm just happier with guy friends, just one of the guys. That's makes me happy, and at peace. I can finally sigh peacefully.
